participant_1.name: Claire Johnson
participant_1.personality: Determined and hardworking, Claire is passionate about her dreams and strives to make a difference in the world through law.
participant_1.background: i'm from a small town. i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i was raised on a horse farm.

participant_2.name: Ethan Rivers
participant_2.personality: Creative and optimistic, Ethan loves expressing himself through music and is always looking for new opportunities to share his passion.
participant_2.background: i also work as a custodian to help pay the bills. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i'm a musician and hope to make it big some day.
